Text:
wow, thankyou.  one of the most brilliant non-fiction books ever written.  completely debunks western thought re: the world.  people are always
asking to borrow my copy, now i can just email them this.
Thanks. I was looking for this!
Thanks so much for seeding...it's hard to find western-recognized scholars from the east!
such an important book! i really needed this, thanks for seeding. so wonderful to find book pirates sharing their bounty! lets get more books on pirate bay!
This looks great. Wish there were more ebooks by Edward Said, Chris Hedges, Ronald Wright and other important political writers at PB. Namaste, SocialTranslation
